评论概述: Fits great for big guys, but the packaging is terrible
评论详情: I love the size and fit of these shirts, and how lightweight they are. I see some reviews state the shirt's material is too thin, and the pink isn't bright enough, I might agree on the pink comments. It's still a great shirt; I own one in black with a red stripe as well. The packaging however, downright sucks. Shirt is wrapped up tighter than a burrito. You can see how wrinkled it is, and you have to absolutely iron it to get them out before you can even wear it. I know Amazon is trying to pack smaller, but how about packing smarter too? That being said, it's a great value for the price, and being 6'2", 310 lbs, this shirt is incredibly comfortable. It justs needs to be packed better to cut down on the wrinkling.
Quality shirt for low price.
